title: Solve the following questions on generators
quizDescription: For the following tasks, would it be best to use a generator, a standard function, or either?

options.option: Either a generator or standard function is fine

questions.questionText: Printing out an unbounded sequence of Fibonacci numbers

options.option: Either a generator or standard function is fine

questions.questionText: Printing out a bounded sequence of prime numbers, where the prime numbers are successively computed by division by smaller primes

options.option: Either a generator or standard function is fine

questions.questionText: Printing out an unbounded sequence of prime numbers, where the prime numbers are successively computed by division by smaller primes

options.option: Either a generator or standard function is fine

questions.questionText: Finding the score of a word from the 6.00x Word Game of Pset 4

options.option: Either a generator or standard function is fine

questions.questionText: Iterating over a sequence of numbers in a random order, where no number is repeated

options.option: Either a generator or standard function is fine
